name: Golden Calyx
description: Golden Calyx by Calyx Garden in a sativa-dominant cross of a Grape Calyx father and a Golden Goat mother. The Golden Calyx phenotype was chosen for its unique expression of the best attributes of its parent. This includes a mind-boggling aroma of piña colada, bubble gum, and lavender alongside uplifting physical effects that help stave off fatigue and nausea. Golden Calyx produces a healthy yield over its 8 to 9 week flowering cycle.
descriptionPlain: Golden Calyx by Calyx Garden in a sativa-dominant cross of a Grape Calyx father and a Golden Goat mother. The Golden Calyx phenotype was chosen for its unique expression of the best attributes of its parent. This includes a mind-boggling aroma of piña colada, bubble gum, and lavender alongside uplifting physical effects that help stave off fatigue and nausea. Golden Calyx produces a healthy yield over its 8 to 9 week flowering cycle.

highlightedReviews.text: this strain is a very strong sativa, reminds me of a indica, very relaxing and relieved my back pain within minutes, was still able to function and work effectively.  this is a good relaxer
